Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(ArrayList<Player> playersList, String id, ServerManager serverMaster)
      Constructor GameController creates a new GameController instance and initializes the game model.
      Parameters:
      playersList - - list of players that are playing the game.
      id - - id of the game.
      serverMaster - - serverManager that manages the server.

  • Method Details

    • chooseTiles

      public void chooseTiles(String token, List<String> userInput)
      Method chooseTiles saves the choice of tiles made by the player if it's valid and notifies the player, otherwise it doesn't save the choice and notifies the player that the choice is invalid.
      Parameters:
      token - - token that identifies the player.
      userInput - - list of strings that represent the positions of the tiles chosen by the player.

    • rearrangeTiles

      public void rearrangeTiles(String token, List<String> order)
      Method rearrangeTiles saves the rearrangement of the tiles made by the player if it's valid and notifies the player, otherwise it doesn't save the rearrangement and notifies the player that the rearrangement is invalid.
      Parameters:
      token - - token that identifies the player.
      order - - list of strings that represent the new order of the tiles chosen by the player.

    • chooseColumn

      public void chooseColumn(String token, int column)
      Method chooseColumn inserts the tiles chosen by the player in the column chosen by the player if it's valid and notifies the player, otherwise it doesn't insert the tiles and notifies the player that the choice is invalid. If the choice is valid it also triggers the update of the game.
      Parameters:
      token - - token that identifies the player.
      column - - integer that represents the column chosen by the player.

    • updateGame

      public void updateGame()
      Method updateGame updates the game by checking the CGCs, updating the board couples and changing the current player. If the last round has started it notifies the players. If someone has completed a CGC it notifies the players.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Method nextTurn changes the current player and if the game has ended it notifies the players.

    • checkCGCs

      public void checkCGCs()
      Method checkCGCs checks if the current player has completed any CGC and if so it gives him the points, then it notifies all players.

    • notifyPointsCGC

      public void notifyPointsCGC()
      Method notifyPointsCGC sends a notification if cardsClaimed contains something (it happens when a player claims a Common Goal Card) and then clears it

    • updateBoardCouples

      public void updateBoardCouples()
      Method updateBoardCouples updates the couples on the board by removing the tiles that have been chosen by the player. It then checks if the board needs to be refilled and if so it refills it.

    • getModel

      public Game getModel()
      Method getModel returns the model of the game.
      Returns:
      - model of the game.

    • notifyOnStartTurn

      public void notifyOnStartTurn(String currentPlayer)
      Method notifyOnStartTurn notifies the players that it's the turn of the current player.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - - nickname of the current player.

    • notifyOnModelUpdate

      public void notifyOnModelUpdate(ModelUpdate modelUpdate)
      Method notifyOnModelUpdate notifies the players that the model has been updated.
      Parameters:
      modelUpdate - - updated model.

    • notifyOnGameEnd

      public void notifyOnGameEnd()
      Method notifyOnEndTurn notifies the players that the last turn has ended.

    • notifyOnLastTurn

      public void notifyOnLastTurn(String nickname)
      Method notifyOnLastTurn notifies the players that the last turn has started.
      Parameters:
      nickname - - nickname of the player that has completed their shelf.

    • setChoiceOfTiles

      public void setChoiceOfTiles(ArrayList<Position> choiceOfTiles)
      Method setChoiceOfTiles is used only for testing.
      Parameters:
      choiceOfTiles - - tiles chosen by the player.

    • getChoiceOfTiles

      public ArrayList<Position> getChoiceOfTiles()
      Method getChoiceOfTiles is used only for testing.
      Returns:
      - tiles chosen by the player.

    • getCardsClaimed

      public Map<Integer,Integer> getCardsClaimed()
      Method getCardsClaimed returns the cards claimed by the player.
      Returns:
      - cards claimed by the player.

    • setLastRound

      public void setLastRound()
      Method setLastRound sets the last round boolean to true.
